cordova-plugin-camera.CAMERA_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: Usage of this app implies attaching a photo of the reported incident.
cordova-plugin-camera.PHOTOLIBRARY_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: Usage of this app implies attaching a photo of the reported incident.

cordova-plugin-geolocation.GEOLOCATION_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: Purpose of this application is to report geolocated incidents. Enabling geolocation detection helps users find their position and speeds up the reporting process.
